explains: n. 许可，允许；同意，赞同；正式批准文件，批文
wordGroup: informed consent 知情同意，知会同意；知后同意
written consent 书面同意；同意书
by common consent adv. 大家都同意（公认）

sentences.en: He was under the age of consent.
sentences.cn: 他那时还不到同意年龄。

sentences.en: Silence must not always be read as consent.
sentences.cn: 不要总是将沉默理解为同意。

sentences.en: The written consent of a parent is required.
sentences.cn: 要求有家长的书面同意。
